statements: DELETE FROM food_activities WHERE activity_type IS NULL;
DELETE FROM food_activities WHERE activity_date < NOW();
DELETE FROM food_activities WHERE activity_name = 'Cooking' AND activity_type = 'Indoor';
DELETE FROM CookingClasses WHERE instructor_name = 'John Smith' AND capacity < 10;
DELETE FROM Tastings WHERE tasting_location = 'Wine Cellar';
DELETE FROM CookingClasses WHERE class_date < '2023-01-01' AND max_capacity < 10;
DELETE FROM Tastings WHERE organizer_name = 'John Doe' OR tasting_type = 'Wine Tasting';
DELETE FROM CookingClasses WHERE class_name = 'Italian Cooking'
DELETE FROM Participants WHERE participant_name = 'John Doe'
